project_info.title: IusTime - Transformación de la Gestión Estratégica

outline.title: IusTime - Transformación de la Gestión Estratégica
outline.summary: Presentación de las nuevas herramientas de alta dirección: Dashboard Global y Revisión Global para una gestión holística.
outline.image_plan: /home/ubuntu/gestion-ius/dashboard_slide_bg.png - The slide is an introduction to a strategic management transformation using a global dashboard and AI. Image 9 is a professional, high-level dashboard visualization that represents the 'Visibilidad Global' and 'Inteligencia Artificial' mentioned.

outline.title: Dashboard Global - Visión de Helicóptero en Tiempo Real
outline.summary: Control total mediante la centralización de datos, semáforos de salud y mapas de riesgos.
outline.image_plan: /home/ubuntu/upload/pasted_file_JxvPtu_image.png; /home/ubuntu/upload/pasted_file_Fc2OCz_image.png; /home/ubuntu/upload/pasted_file_SOZWiS_image.png; /home/ubuntu/upload/pasted_file_IoihKu_image.png - The slide describes the 'Dashboard Global' and its components (centralization, risks, tasks). Images 1, 2, 3, and 4 show the navigation menu, task creation, task list, and risk registration, which are all components of the system that feeds the dashboard.

outline.title: Revisión Global - Inteligencia Artificial al Servicio de la Estrategia
outline.summary: Análisis profundo y generación automática de informes estratégicos con IA.
outline.image_plan: /home/ubuntu/upload/pasted_file_t2JciY_image.png; /home/ubuntu/upload/pasted_file_TWwLRb_image.png; /home/ubuntu/upload/pasted_file_eHysMU_image.png - The slide focuses on the 'Revisión Global' and the AI-assisted executive report generation. Images 5, 6, and 7 show the 'Revisión Mensual' interface, which includes the executive summary, logs, risks, and strategic next steps, directly illustrating the feature.

outline.title: Beneficios Estratégicos para la Dirección
outline.summary: Alineación organizacional, agilidad en respuesta y transparencia radical como pilares del cambio.

outline.title: Próximos Pasos e Implementación
outline.summary: Hoja de ruta para la adopción inmediata de las herramientas y feedback continuo.
outline.image_plan: /home/ubuntu/upload/pasted_file_VRbNLd_image.png - The slide is about implementation, adoption, and required actions for directors. Image 8 shows the 'Configuración' (Configuration) screen with user management and roles, which is relevant to the implementation and assigning access/responsibilities for the new tools.
